# Testing

> Writing and running automated tests for .NET applications including unit tests, integration tests, and load tests. Supported frameworks include MSTest, xUnit, and NUnit with `dotnet test` CLI integration. Use `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing` for web API integration tests; `Microsoft.Playwright` for browser testing.

*Topics available: 120*

- [Testing in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/index.md): This article gives a brief overview of testing concepts, terminology, and tools for testing in .NET.
- [Microsoft.Testing.Platform capabilities overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/microsoft-testing-platform-architecture-capabilities.md): Learn about Microsoft.Testing.Platform capabilities concept.
